com.heaton.bot
Class SSL

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.heaton.bot.SSL
class SSL
extends java.lang.Object

The SSL class is used to provide an interface to JSSE without making the entire package dependant on JSSE being installed.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jeff Heaton

Field Detail

_factory

protected static javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory _factory
A factory used to create SSL sockets from. This factory is created when the class is first loaded and reused for each new socket.

getSSLSocket

public static java.net.Socket getSSLSocket(java.lang.String host,
                                           int port)
                                    throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                                           java.io.IOException
This method is called to get an SSL client socket for the specified host and port.
Parameters:
host - The host to connect to.
port - The port to connect to.
Returns:
A SSL socket.
